TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IExpandProvider

Docs.summary: This interface declares the methods required to support the `$expand` query option for an [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/add/includes/ssastoria-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerable ApplyExpansions(class System.Linq.IQueryable queryable, class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class System.Data.Services.ExpandSegmentCollection> expandPaths) cil managed

Docs.param: A collection of paths to expand.
Docs.summary: Applies expansions to the specified parameter.
Docs.returns: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> object of the same type as the supplied object that includes the specified .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ApplyExpansions method may modify the `expandPaths` to indicate which expansions are included.
The returned <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> may implement the <xref:System.Data.Services.IExpandedResult> interface to provide enumerable objects for the expansions; otherwise, the expanded information is expected to be found directly in the enumerated objects.
